thread.title: Lindsay Lohan Says She Was Racially Profiled for Wearing a Headscarf While Traveling From Turkey

author: Dee Lockett
title: Lindsay Lohan Says She Was Racially Profiled for Wearing a Headscarf While Traveling From Turkey
text: Amid speculation that Lindsay Lohan may be converting to Islam , the actress now says she was recently a victim of Islamophobia. While traveling from London to New York after meeting with Turkish president Recep Tayyip Erdoğan in Turkey to discuss the global refugee crisis, Lohan claims... More »
